---
id: query-group-list-in-the-app
title: "Query the group list in the App"
description: "Get the IDs of all groups in the App."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Query the group list in the App</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Get the IDs of all groups in the App.

<Warning title="Note">The retrieved data may have a delay of up to 1 minute.</Warning>

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 1 time/s</Note>

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Limit"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 10000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Number of group IDs to retrieve at once, with a value range of [0, 10000], meaning this API can return a maximum of 10,000 group IDs per call.\n\nWhen the number of groups in the App exceeds the Limit, you need to call this API multiple times <b>and the Limit must remain consistent</b>.\n\nIf empty or greater than 10,000, the default value is 10,000.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":10000,"example":100}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Next"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Pagination flag. Fill in 0 for the first time, and then fill in the value returned last time. When the returned Next is 0, it means the group list has been fully retrieved.\n\nFor example, if there are 25,000 groups in the App, when calling this API to query the group list:\n\n- First call: Set Limit to 10,000 and Next to 0 to query groups 1 to 10,000; the Next value in the returned result is 1.\n- Second call: Set Limit to 10,000 and Next to 1 to query groups 10,001 to 20,000; the Next value in the returned result is 2.\n- Third call: Set Limit to 10,000 and Next to 2 to query groups 20,001 to 25,000; the query is complete, and the Next value in the returned result is 0.\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
